task.title: Integrating the Oxygen WebHelp Plugin with the DocBook XSL Distribution

taskbody.context: To integrate the Oxygen WebHelp plugin with the DocBook XSL distribution, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download and install a Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later.
Download and install ANT 8.0 or later.
Download and unzip on your computer the DocBook XSL distribution.
Unzip the WebHelp distribution package in the DocBook XSL installation directory.
step.stepresult: The DocBook XSL directory now contains a new subdirectory named com.oxygenxml.webhelp and two new files, oxygen_custom.xsl and oxygen_custom_html.xsl.

step.cmd: Download and unzip saxon6-5-5.zip on your computer.
Download and unzip saxonb9-1-0-8j.zip on your computer.
